qas.question: What type of instrument became more refined during the classical era?
What is the single reed family called?
What type of instrument was somewhat standardized int eh Baroque era?
Who expanded the single reeds role?

context: <a0_0>Wind<a0_0/> instruments became more refined in the Classical era. While <a2_0>double reeded<a2_0/> instruments like the oboe and bassoon became somewhat standardized in the Baroque, <a1_0>the clarinet family<a1_0/> of single reeds was not widely used until <a3_0>Mozart<a3_0/> expanded its role in orchestral, chamber, and concerto settings.
